stages.logText: After you chased away a fog monster, the fog suddenly dissipated.
Another fog monster guarded the footbridge to the hut. As long as there was still fog somewhere around the hut, you couldn't drive it away.
In the hut you encountered a terrifying looking witch.
You defeated the old witch in battle. So there would be no new fog.
You were able to convince Mim to keep the road clear of fog.
You convinced Mim to replace the fog with a distraction spell.
On the road to Feygard I have met a boy called Tobby. He is looking for his brother Sobby.
I have promised to help Tobby to pass the cobolds to the south.
Tobby has followed me to the beginning of the ravine of the cobolds.
Tobby has made it through the ravine.
And he followed me further to the south.
I have attacked poor Tobby, but he ran away. Now he will never find his brother.
We have parted. Tobby was sure now to find his brother.
I have met Tobby again, together with Sobby in the little village in the woods.
